text: The Danube whitefin gudgeon (Romanogobio vladykovi)Kottelat, M. and J. Freyhof, 2007. Handbook of European freshwater fishes. Publications Kottelat, Cornol, Switzerland. 646 p. is a species of freshwater fish in the family Cyprinidae. It is distributed in the Danube drainage. The maximal length is 11.5 cm, maximal reported age 4 years. ==References== ==Sources== * Category:Romanogobio Category:Cyprinid fish of Europe Category:Fish described in 1943
title: Danube whitefin gudgeon
